name: Two Sided Dung
description:
A grid based 3D dungeon crawlers game made for game jam.

Game done by only me.

Animations and models are from mixamo.

"Wooden Spikes" (https://skfb.ly/6X6KG) by Davor Mulalic is licensed under Creative Commons Attribution (http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/).

"Animated Lever" (https://skfb.ly/6SUty) by Thunder is licensed under Creative Commons Attribution (http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/).
